column5: With all the openers and spring fishing trips at this time of year I thought this just might slip someone's mind. Plus now that I've bought my cards you can have at the left-overs.

Thanks for the reminder Rob ! One call that I, unfortunately, don't have to make this year.... but it reminds me to kick the kids! Both girls come in from Paris Friday night and it will be the last thing on their minds to have taken care of...
Oh and here's another helpful hint. NEVER buy them anything with a cord.
Does a big prime rib count?  JF
As long as you include a good supply of batteries...
I'm covered. Now I just have to fund my kids presents. The boat fund is takin' a hit!
Me mudders da best mudder in the world.
I made these.      should cover it.
I have one left for sale.
Nice. Crankbaits and spinners would fit in those real nice.
Xactly why I bought it Rob !!!

it's what when? I swear it was "you have done enought work around the house so go fishing" weekend?  PS, this is just to take away from me NEEDING to win a hat post at the top of the posts right now.  SOOO, I love you MOM and to my wife, our KIDS AND I LOVE YOU TOO!

And to all you new fathers out there...don't forget to at least give your wife a card if it is her first Mother's Day...I missed completely and the "but you are not my mother" didn't cut it...not for many years...
